Schedule Overview

Bootcamp is held in the week prior to the start of Fall classes, from September 12, 2022 to September 16, 2022. Unless specified otherwise, activities are held in MET room 141. Breakfast and lunch are provided each day. See Schedule Details for more information on each event.

Please note the schedule is actively being developed and is subject to change.
